thread.title: Reports of long delays on M4 into Wales |
thread.title_full: Reports of long delays on M4 into Wales | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Reports of long delays on M4 into Wales |
text:
There are long delays on the M4 this evening Credit: Sarah Johnson There are reports of long delays on the M4 coming into Wales.
The Highways Agency is reporting that traffic between junctions 22 and 26 of the westbound M4 could face severe disruption.
Total Travel SW @Traffic_SouthW Follow Still long delays on the #M4 westbound from Swindon all the way into South Wales due to the rugby tonight in Cardiff (17:44)
17:44 - 2 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite It says it's not expecting normal traffic conditions until 8pm.
Last updated Fri 2 Oct 2015 Travel South Wales
